title: Did the prophet Muhammad ever own slaves or condone slavery? - Quora

response.answer_text: He had slaves. Zayeed for eg, was a slave. He was later emancipated by the Prophet and became his adopted son. Unlike any other religions of its time that I know of, Islam is the only religion that incorporated emancipation of slaves as an act of penance. Slavery was a reality that needed to be dealt with, the world was not ready for total abolishment for slavery then. But there was steps taken to regulate it.
